comments.body:
Fixing this should be a prereq for moving to beta IMO. This is already a map[string]bool for the kubelet
cc @xiangpengzhao @mtaufen
Golint comments: comment on exported const LeastConnection should be of the form "LeastConnection ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: exported method ProxyMode.Type should have comment or be unexported. [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->

Golint comments: comment on exported const LocalityBasedLeastConnectionWithReplication should be of the form "LocalityBasedLeastConnectionWithReplication ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: comment on exported const DestinationHashing should be of the form "DestinationHashing ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: exported method ConfigurationMap.Set should have comment or be unexported. [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: should have a package comment, unless it's in another file for this package. [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#package-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: comment on exported const WeightedRoundRobin should be of the form "WeightedRoundRobin ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: exported type ConfigurationMap should have comment or be unexported. [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: exported method ProxyMode.Set should have comment or be unexported. [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +208,212 @@)

func (m *ProxyMode) Set(s string) error {
	*m = ProxyMode(s)
	return nil

comments.body: Golint comments: comment on exported const RoundRobin should be of the form "RoundRobin ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->

Golint comments: comment on exported const WeightedLeastConnection should be of the form "WeightedLeastConnection ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->

Golint comments: comment on exported type ProxyMode should be of the form "ProxyMode ..." (with optional leading article). [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->

Golint comments: comment on exported const ShortestExpectedDelay should be of the form "ShortestExpectedDelay ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: comment on exported const NeverQueue should be of the form "NeverQueue ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: comment on exported const SourceHashing should be of the form "SourceHashing ...". [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
Golint comments: exported method ConfigurationMap.Type should have comment or be unexported. [More info](https://golang.org/wiki/CodeReviewComments#doc-comments). <!-- golint -->
